entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
